import useFetch from '../hooks/useFetch' import comentario from '../img/comentario.png' import './list.css' function List(){ const list = useFetch('http://127.0.0.1:3000/service/list') const users = useFetch('http://127.0.0.1:3000/service/users') console.log(list) return ( <>

{list?.map(lis => {users?.map(u=>

User:{u.id === lis.userId && u.username}

) } export default List
